title: Unicorn forever
excerpt: A solo designer and developer's plan for the future
list1: Take articles from http://metamn.io/gust/ dissect them into small semantic chunks and convert into data with every chunk annotated and further described with metadata.
Add artwork, rich media, animations etc. to content and chunks of content.
Create a design system which displays the content optimized for web, app and print.
Marketing for free on web, set up a freemium app model to cover basic expenses, and go premium with magazine and book versions of the same online content.
Focus on growing the content, making it more inclusive, reaching more audience, and generate recurring revenue.
